CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, March 30, 1963, pg. 17 reads: "Club 21 - These lovely members of the ...young set are shown at a meeting last week in Loendi Club. Club 21 is a ....CARE as its main program...smaller volunteer projects such as volunteer work in the United Fund's Health-O-Rama.  The club was started in 1954 by 21 girls under the sponsorship of Mary (Dee) Goode. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of eleven Club 21 members, including Becky Wilson wearing plaid dress seated on floor, Myrna Morter, and Charlotte Carter seated on arms of chair, club president Doris Hand Terry in center, Shirley Hand, Vivian Swaine, Jean Bell, Pat Adams, and Louise Hampton standing in rear, in Loendi Club, another version
